name: Basic Analysis Workflow (V4 Unified)

start_analysis.description: Initial placeholder task to receive context.

inputs.content: Starting basic analysis for query: {{initial_context.user_query | default('Not Provided')}} (User: {{initial_context.user_id | default('Unknown')}})

SEARCH RESULTS:

```
{{perform_web_search.answer}}
```
